Question & Options:
In the 2003 movie 'Bhoot', which song has a remixed version included in the soundtrack?
Options:
A. Bhoot Hoon Main
B. Tera Mera Rishta
C. Chura Liya Hai Tumne Jo Dil Ko
D. Kabhi Neem Neem

In the 2003 movie 'Bhoot', which songs are part of the soundtrack?
Options:
A. Bhoot Hai Yahan Koi
B. Dead But Not Asleep
C. Both 'Bhoot Hai Yahan Koi' and 'Dead But Not Asleep'
D. None of the above
Correct Answer: Both 'Bhoot Hai Yahan Koi' and 'Dead But Not Asleep'
